name: communitycaster
description: - Account Abstraction for creating an acocunt for the app - User can join a community -> They will pay a monthly fee - Monthy fee is pooled together and only accesaable by community vote - Person can post a porposal - all is done through farcaster frames and MACI infactstrucutre for avoiding colusion - SmartContract logic is hosted on Arbitrum Nova(think it's better than one for our usecase because it's cheaper)
